[i][b]Gerard Depardieu and Gerard Jugnot bravely take on this classic from 1932: Boudu Saved From Drowning about a tramp that jumps into the Seine. Moving the locale from the original Paris to Aix-En-Provence and switching the bookstore for an antique shop, nothing is lost from this classic comedy about a larger than life French tramp.
[/b][/i]
